name: Snowball Roll
description:
Snowball Roll is a puzzle game where you try to have the biggest snowball at the end.
More distance the snowball roll, more it will be big. Use obstacle to guide the ball threw the trees.

Gameplay: Only with the mouse.
Left click to place a obstacle, click on it again to move it (use the mouse wheel to rotate).
If you place a obstacle outside of the game area, the obstacle will be sell, (you recover all points paid).

Game made during "My First Game Jam: Winter 2023"
Theme: Growth
